front.title: IPv6 anycast based feedback data aggregation

abstract.t: This document describes how to use anycast addresses for collectingfeedback information on the reverse link in case of multicast forwardtransmission. The application for anycast addressing in the case ofmulticast transmission is the novelty. The draft describes thefundamentals and requirements about how to collect and aggregatefeedback information if anycasting is applied.
